desc: A unique hand picked selection from our friendly, independent jewellers based in Dorchester, Dorset UK. Making gifting easy from our beautiful selection of art deco, antique, pre-owned or second hand and new jewellery. Show your loved ones you care with a gift from Jordans.

layout.text: Explore our beautiful range of engagement rings available to buy online or in store at Jordans Jewellers. With a stunning range of engagement diamond and colourful gemstone types, styles, and designs to choose from.
